Columbia’s cost of attendance has been steadily increasing in the last 10 years

The inflation rate of the U.S. dollar from 2013 to 2023 is approximately 29.81 percent while Columbia’s total term bill has increased approximately 32.92 percent in the same timeframe.

Mandatory Fees

Room and Board

Total term bill for the 2023-24 academic year.

Source: Columbia University Office of the Provost
